appDescription: CueCard Teleprompter keeps your speaker notes visible above any app, so you can stay on script without switching screens. Whether you're recording a video, presenting, or speaking live, your notes flow with you wherever you go.

features.title: Auto-Scroll Teleprompter
features.description: Auto-scroll your script at a comfortable pace so you can stay focused.

features.title: Floats Over All Apps
features.description: Your notes stay visible while using Camera, Instagram, TikTok, or any other app.

features.title: Resizable Window
features.description: Adjust the teleprompter size to fit your screen perfectly.

features.title: Adjustable Text
features.description: Customize font size and scroll speed for comfortable reading.

faq.question: How does the floating teleprompter work?
faq.answer: CueCard creates a floating window that stays on top of all your apps. You can record videos, go live, or present while your notes remain visible only to you.

faq.question: Is CueCard available for iPhone and Android?
faq.answer: Yes! CueCard is coming soon to both the App Store (iOS) and Google Play Store (Android).

faq.question: Can I use it with my camera app?
faq.answer: CueCard floats over any app including your native camera, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and more.

faq.question: Is there a desktop version?
faq.answer: Yes! CueCard is also available for macOS and Windows with additional features like Google Slides sync. Try the desktop version.
